name: Journey to The Not Bus Place
name_original: Journey to The Not Bus Place
description:
-Controls-
Movment: WASD/Arrows
Attack: Z/Enter
Jump: Space
Switch: C, Backspace

-Story-
https://docs.google.com/document/d/1XrkvIUNZxwhK1R4EkVTHB5PM_DShdWLoywOM2rOEWzo/...

-About-
Created for the DesertBuForHope 2018 Game Jam, this was my first foray into unreal and visual programming. The game consists of a single level with a few different puzzles that can be solved a couple of ways. I wanted to do an intro bit that runs through the story but ran out of time. Please Enjoy, and check out DesertBus.org in November for their annual charity fundraiser!

-Achievements (Not Implemented)-
Get all 53 coins!
Win with only Liz! (Theoretically possible)
Win without moving backwards!
Jump over Not Matt!

-Bugs-
Occasionally the camera will scroll left at the end of the game instead of right
Volume of sound effects does not dampen with distance
